聲.definition: sound; voice; tone; noise; reputation; classifier for sounds

聲優.definition: voice actor (orthographic borrowing from Japanese 声優 "seiyū")

聲勢.definition: fame and power; prestige; influence; impetus; momentum

聲囊.definition: vocal sac; vocal pouch (for vocal amplification in male frogs)

聲帶.definition: vocal cords; vocal folds; (motion picture) soundtrack

聲息.definition: sound (often with negative, not a sound); whisper

聲情並茂.definition: (of a singer etc) excellent in voice and expression (idiom)

聲押.definition: to apply to a court for an arrest warrant

聲旁字.definition: character serving as sound value of another character; phonetic

聲明.definition: to state; to declare; statement; declaration; CL:項|项[xiang4],份[fen4]

聲東擊西.definition: to threaten the east and strike to the west (idiom); to create a diversion

聲母.definition: the initial consonant of a Chinese syllable; the phonetic component of a phono-semantic compound character (e.g. the component 青[qing1] in 清[qing1])

聲波定位.definition: sonic location system (esp. underwater sonar); acoustic positioning

聲淚俱下.definition: to shed tears while recounting sth; speaking in a tearful voice

聲稱.definition: to claim; to state; to proclaim; to assert

聲符.definition: phonetic component of a Chinese character (e.g. the component 青[qing] in 清[qing1])

聲線.definition: voice (as sth that may be described as husky 沙啞|沙哑[sha1ya3] or deep 低沉[di1chen2] etc); (physics) sound ray

聲言.definition: to state; to declare; pronouncement; declaration

聲訓.definition: explaining a character or word by using a homophone

聲調.definition: tone; note; a tone (on a Chinese syllable); CL:個|个[ge4]

聲請.definition: to make a formal request; formal request; to make a claim (law)

聲部.definition: part (in multipart instrumental or choral music), such as the soprano part or bass part

聲類.definition: Shenglei, the earliest Chinese rime dictionary with 11,520 single-character entries, released in 3rd century (was not preserved to this day)

聲鵐.definition: (bird species of China) common reed bunting (Emberiza schoeniclus)
